cluster.name: TV Channel
cluster.description: This cluster provides an interface for controlling the current TV Channel on a device.

command.name: ChangeChannel
command.description: Change the channel on the TV to the channel case-insensitive exact matching the value passed as an argument.

command.name: ChangeChannelByNumber
command.description: Change the channel on the TV to the channel with the given Number in the ChannelList attribute.

command.name: SkipChannel
command.description: This command provides channel up and channel down functionality, but allows channel index jumps of size Count. When the value of the increase or decrease is larger than the number of channels remaining in the given direction, then the behavior SHALL be to return to the beginning (or end) of the channel list and continue. For example, if the current channel is at index 0 and count value of -1 is given, then the current channel should change to the last channel.

command.name: ChangeChannelResponse
command.description: Upon receipt, this SHALL display the active status of the input list on screen.
